text:
Oh, Kiriko.
About that photo shoot, it looks like it'll be next week.

Oh, it's also for promoting the debut live.
It'll be simple, but they'll also do some coverage.
I'm not confident in speaking well...

Oh, no... Don't worry too much.
Just talk with the interviewer.

Yeah, just like you're talking with me now.
Thinking of it that way, doesn't it feel a bit easier?

...Yes...
In that case... I'll do my best... to talk...
